Package btindexmodels

Class BTIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rdfhdt.hdt.triples.impl.BitmapTriples
      • btindexmodels.BTIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.rdfhdt.hdt.triples.Triples, org.rdfhdt.hdt.triples.TriplesPrivate
    public class BTIndex
extends org.rdfhdt.hdt.triples.impl.BitmapTriples
    This class represents an extension of the BitmapTriples class in order to create a type_i-type_j index for two RDF types of a given HDT file. The only difference to the original BitmapTriples class is that an additional id sequence for the subjects is saved in the BT Index class to retrieve the correct subject ID from the original HDT dictionary.
    Author:
    Maximilian Wenzel
